Articles.Content:
What do you think about my new rocket, i accepted contract for testing rockomax radial engine i had some problem they damaged my central booster, but somehow i fix it, i wonder what i did wrong in it.

BTW the Mk-55 "Thud" is really great how unlock it, it was experimental part so i need to unlock it.

I wonder how much engines i need to send Probe to EVE or Duna, i heard that decelerating in Duna atmosphere with new aerodynamics is now harder than ever.

What do you think about my new video :D
[video=youtube;TQzJtJYXJDE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TQzJtJYXJDE[/video]

"What do you think about my new rocket" Looks ok in the frame shown in your post, although it doesn't seem to have much at the bottom to counter the drag from those high engines. If it works, then it can't have needed it :-)
"i wonder what i did wrong in it" can't tell from that frame.
""Thud" is really great how unlock it" Thud is in "Advanced Rocketry", top of level-4 tech in the tree (counting starter-tech as level-1)
"I wonder how much engines i need to send Probe to EVE or Duna" One, if you do it right ^^. More than one is always less efficient, but what you [I]need[/I] depends on the probe you're sending.
"What do you think about my new video" I have to pay for broadband and don't watch videos in general.

[quote name='Pecan']"What do you think about my new rocket" Looks ok in the frame shown in your post, although it doesn't seem to have much at the bottom to counter the drag from those high engines. If it works, then it can't have needed it :-)
"i wonder what i did wrong in it" can't tell from that frame.
""Thud" is really great how unlock it" Thud is in "Advanced Rocketry", top of level-4 tech in the tree (counting starter-tech as level-1)
"I wonder how much engines i need to send Probe to EVE or Duna" One, if you do it right ^^. More than one is always less efficient, but what you [I]need[/I] depends on the probe you're sending.
"What do you think about my new video" I have to pay for broadband and don't watch videos in general.[/QUOTE]

It need to look as it is the contract required to test "Thud" engine at 19 000 to 22 000 m and sped 490 - 550.
I designed it for that purpose.
Thread moved to the sub for player-made videos.
